sentences.english: Above prices are in MOP and are subject to 10% service charge.
sentences.chinese: 以上價目以澳門幣結算，需附加10%的服務費。

sentences.english: The price is including the post service in HK, if post to the other country will be charge the additional fee.
sentences.chinese: 價目只包本港郵寄服務，如海外郵遞服務須另加收費。

sentences.english: All prices are subject to a 10% service charge.
sentences.chinese: 以上價目另收加一服務費。

sentences.english: There is a price-list hanging on one of the walls which is removed in case of an inspection.
sentences.chinese: 一面牆上掛有價目表，在有人來檢查時，就會取下來。

sentences.english: Enclosed you will find a copy of pricelist.
sentences.chinese: 茲隨函附上價目表一份，請查收。

sentences.english: Scout Association of Hong Kong reserves the absolute right to alter the price without prior notice.
sentences.chinese: 香港童軍總會保留修改價目之權利而毋須事前通知。

sentences.english: We have pleasure in enclosing a copy of our illustrated catalogue and price list.
sentences.chinese: 很高興隨附一份我方的圖解目錄和價目單。

sentences.english: 211Please send us your price list of quartz clocks。
sentences.chinese: 請寄給我們貴方的石英鐘價目單。

sentences.english: He bought the coffeepot at 6 dollars off the list price.
sentences.chinese: 他以低於價目表6美元的價格買下了那個咖啡壺。

sentences.english: Theres a mini-bar under the table. The price list is on the top of it.
sentences.chinese: 桌子底下有一個食品櫃，價目表在食器櫃上面。

sentences.english: In accordance with your request, we are sending you herewith our price list and some pamphlets.
sentences.chinese: 根據你方要求現附寄價目表及說明書數本。

sentences.english: B: I'll check the rates and call you back .
sentences.chinese: 我來查一下價目再給你回電。

sentences.english: Designing a pricing table is a tricky task.
sentences.chinese: 設計價目表是個講究技巧的工作。

sentences.english: Do you see the new list of price on the notice-board ?
sentences.chinese: 你看到佈告欄上新的價目表了嗎？

sentences.english: A: And I want these price lists as well.
sentences.chinese: 還有這些價目表我也要。

definition: variant of 訂單|订单[ding4 dan1]
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
